patthana24.11:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana24.11:0.3_0: There are necessities for the eon.
patthana24.11:1.1_0: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes.
patthana24.11:10.1_0: Not knowing the cause, the reason for the sake of contentment, the cause and the reason for the sake of unconfusence arises when you don’t arise.
patthana24.11:11.1_0: Not because of contentment, the cause and condition for the sake of a lower realm.
patthana24.11:12.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of worldly gain ...
patthana24.11:13.1_0: Since this is so, for the sake of purification through any other reason for someone else.
patthana24.11:14.1_0: Not by means of this quality, they wouldn’t cause any condition for the sake of another.
patthana24.11:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
patthana24.11:2.1_3: said that the sound of conditioned phenomena is found.
patthana24.11:3.1_0: For the sake of seeing the causes and conditions for the sake of seeing the causes.
patthana24.11:4.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause of a reason for the sake of seeing the causes and conditions to arise.
patthana24.11:5.1_0: causes and conditions for the sake of health.
patthana24.11:6.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause of health, the reason for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana24.11:7.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form, the causes and conditions are causes.
patthana24.11:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of form,
patthana24.11:8.1_1: said to be a group of three.
patthana24.11:8.1_2: This is the cause, based on brief, three supports, or four.
patthana24.11:9.1_0: Neither gives rise to thought: the causes and conditions for the sake of worldly gain ... the reason for the sake of material possessions ... for the sake of causes.
